segments.text: I heard you will be going on a business trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I must go to Shanghai to attend a meeting about our plan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you be away ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Harry . He has been assisting me on the plan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good choice . He is competent for the position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he is familiar with the plan .
segments.speaker: S2
